name: Plug Skins 4D for Minecraft
description:
Skins that change the LOOK, SIZE, and SHAPE of your character, including CAPES!
Bored of the same old humanoid steve shape? Want to be something different... Now you can with Plug Skins 4D for Minecraft - Another world first by the developers of the famous Plug Apps:
• Why live in a giant house when you can become one?! Yes that's right you can play as your character being a giant house, tree or even small village. Your entire shape, size and look will be changed.
• Like ships? Why not become a flying ship with moving parts?
• Become a dinosaur, or egg lolz
• Works with Minecraft for iOS - This is not just a guide, this app includes real skins you can use right now in Minecraft for iOS right from your device without a computer or anything else.
There's so many possibilities, and more skins added regularly. Receive a notification ever time we add skins, or feel free to make and submit your own right from inside the app.
As always, there's no In App Purchases and ALL content is unlocked and yours right from the outset.
Have some real fun, prank your friends, or live out your dreams playing as a block or character you've always wanted to - nothing can hold you back!
So, don’t wait, download Plug Skins 4D for Minecraft today and get all the 4D skins you can handle. If you can imagine it, Plug Skins 4D can help you be it.
Tweet us @indevelopers with your screenshots, videos, and skin requests
--
Not an official Minecraft product, nor approved by or associated with Mojang.
